text: Dearne Community & Miners Welfare F.C. was an English association football club from Goldthorpe, South Yorkshire. The club competed in the FA Amateur Cup in 1947, and won the Hatchard League in 1958 and 1959 ==References== Category:Defunct football clubs in England Category:Defunct football clubs in South Yorkshire Category:Sheffield Association League Category:Barnsley Association League Category:Hatchard League Category:Doncaster & District Senior League Category:Mining association football teams in England
title: Dearne Community & Miners Welfare F.C.
